explanatory comments/crosstagging: Central Cottage Industries – a private, not state-sponsored enterprise – is particularly noteworthy, as its mission became the selection of ‘traditional’ motifs that could serve as marketing themes in a given commercial campaign (usually lasting 18-24 months), and then working with craftspeople in ways that harnessed and perpetuated traditional crafts skills while providing market-savvy decisions about the types of goods to be produced that would meet desires of the new middle class. (Sandria B. Freitag)(gs)
